text: The 1972 AFC Asian Cup was the 5th edition of the men's AFC Asian Cup, a quadrennial international football tournament organised by the Asian Football Confederation (AFC). The finals were held in Thailand between 7 May and 19 May 1972. It was won by Iran. ==Qualification== * (qualified automatically as defending champions) * originally qualified as host, but later withdrew. The other 5 qualifying teams were: * * * * * ==Squads== ==Venue== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !rowspan=4| !
